title: Ornn, the Fire Below the Mountain | Champion Trailer

replies.body: I really miss the cinematics. If we get one for Eve though, that would be one of the best choices for a cinematic in a long time.
Yeah, I could see an Eve cinematic being pretty awesome. An Urgot cinematic would have been cool too.
Totally agree.

Damn straight 
We need one hell of a teaser cinematic for Evelynn 
What sort of settings do you think would be most fitting if riot releases one

* A chase scene like {{champion:19}}  and {{champion:421}}  - whereby you have the terrorfied victim running for their lives, trying to escape
*  or a storyteller setting like {{champion:223}}  - a chilling story on her dark deeds
*  or just plain  good old fashioned battle sequence between her and {{champion:67}}  or some other champion

> [{quoted}](name=Xodiathe4bdn1,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6JbwEvrP,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-08-21T20:37:28.876+0000)
>
> Damn straight 
> We need one hell of a short teaser cinematic for Evelynn 
> What sort of settings do you you think would be most fitting for such a video
> 
> * A chase scene like {{champion:19}}  and {{champion:421}}  - whereby you have the terrorfied victim running for their lives, trying to escape
> *  or a storyteller setting like {{champion:223}}  - a chilling story on her dark deeds
> *  or just plain  good old fashioned battle sequence between her and {{champion:67}}  or some other champion

OMG YES a battle between her and Vayne !

I can imagine Vayne trying to chase her, and Evelynn appearing from the shadows and revealing herself with a sadistic laugh, and the scene would be in her temple in the mountains like in Vayne's lore, Eve made a cult of herself now

Sort of depends on the style of the cinematic. If its more like an anime, such as Bard or Rek'Sai's, then probably the second or third option. If its realistic, which I would prefer for eve, like Warwick or Aurelion Sol's animations, I think a chase/battle/attack scene would be cool.
I hope none of you get disappointed.
This may be just a wild guess, but those soldiers.... Iceborn Azir?
It is Galactic Azir's Soldier Models just edited to have the Freljord Mark on them
Awwww, well maybe one day.
More like they used Azir's soldier model for freljordian soldiers. They have mark of Freljord in back.

Damn, this music can make even the shittiest video touching.

God fucking like. I want to kneel before group who has created this song.
Riot Talondor was the composer for Ornn. He did a beautiful job rewriting his Ornn music for this trailer.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot TreblMuffin,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6JbwEvrP,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-08-21T18:14:07.167+0000)
>
> Riot Talondor was the composer for Ornn. He did a beautiful job rewriting his Ornn music for this trailer.

Can you ask him to post the original lyrics for the Path to Hearthhome, rather than just the translated ones? As someone who understands the scandinavian languages, it'd be really awesome to see how many of the words are actual ones, rather than just ones that sound similar.

Part when Ornn appears is my favourite. It was so intense and touching I got goosebumps.

Please say him/her how talented he/she is.

Riot, Can you please give {{champion:23}} some lore within the frelijord with the frelijord being in the spotlight?  I know you said Ornn "would have a very specific opinion" of his weapon, but I was hoping for some kind of involvement or any kind of lore.

> [{quoted}](name=TimX24968B,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6JbwEvrP,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-08-21T19:06:27.518+0000)
>
> Riot, Can you please give {{champion:23}} some lore within the frelijord with the frelijord being in the spotlight?  I know you said Ornn "would have a very specific opinion" of his weapon, but I was hoping for some kind of involvement or any kind of lore.

I'll just tell you: Ornn would think that Tryn's sword is REALLY ostentatious. Ornn likes simple and effective weapons. He's very much a substance over style kind of god.
Why does Trynd have a sword like that in the first place?
Gotcha, but it still is a pretty effective sword.  I just hope with with the frelijord in the spotlight this man can get some more lore and maybe some of the other frelijord champions as well.
So is Sejuani serving under Volibear now?

If I was Sejuani, I would let a demigod be over me. :P

I have thought about Lissandra being here more. Even though Lissandra would agree to work with them for her future plans, Volibear wouldn't even let her come 1 km near.

It is just high likely non-canon trailer.
Wait, Orn is a god like what illaoi worships?

This cinematic is pretty sweet but I'm really confused - why is Lissandra there?! Volibear and Sejuani have joined forces, but their objective was specifically to oppose Lissandra! Why does this trailer imply that all three of them are on the same side??? Is this a mistake or have they joined forces now?
ok, i want that weather on ARAM, that would look so awesome
Please make a cinematic for Eve !
